content.raw:
I stopped looking into it for now; I suggest the following help change:

~~~
diff -r eee875d72f1d src/cmd/cmdmsgs.rb.in
--- a/src/cmd/cmdmsgs.rb.in	Fri Mar 30 18:01:37 2018 +0200
+++ b/src/cmd/cmdmsgs.rb.in	Fri Mar 30 13:41:09 2018 -0300
@@ -35,12 +35,12 @@
                "  --force-version <VERSION>  Use a specific library version.\n"\
                '  --versions                 Show the available versions.'
 COMMANDS = {  'msg' =>
-                       "Print information about ignition messages.\n\n" +
-                       "  ign msg [options]\n\n" +
-                       "Options:\n\n" +
-                       "  -i [ --info ]         Get info about a message.\n" +
-                       "  -l [ --list ]         List all topics.\n" +
-                       COMMON_OPTIONS
+                 "Print information about ignition messages.\n\n" +
+                 "  ign msg [options]\n\n" +
+                 "Options:\n\n" +
+                 "  -i [ --info ] arg     Get info about a message type.\n" +
+                 "  -l [ --list ]         List all message types.\n" +
+                 COMMON_OPTIONS
 }
 
 #
~~~
content.html:
I stopped looking into it for now; I suggest the following help change:

diff -r eee875d72f1d src/cmd/cmdmsgs.rb.in
--- a/src/cmd/cmdmsgs.rb.in Fri Mar 30 18:01:37 2018 +0200
+++ b/src/cmd/cmdmsgs.rb.in Fri Mar 30 13:41:09 2018 -0300
@@ -35,12 +35,12 @@
                "  --force-version <VERSION>  Use a specific library version.\n"\
                '  --versions                 Show the available versions.'
 COMMANDS = {  'msg' =>
-                       "Print information about ignition messages.\n\n" +
-                       "  ign msg [options]\n\n" +
-                       "Options:\n\n" +
-                       "  -i [ --info ]         Get info about a message.\n" +
-                       "  -l [ --list ]         List all topics.\n" +
-                       COMMON_OPTIONS
+                 "Print information about ignition messages.\n\n" +
+                 "  ign msg [options]\n\n" +
+                 "Options:\n\n" +
+                 "  -i [ --info ] arg     Get info about a message type.\n" +
+                 "  -l [ --list ]         List all message types.\n" +
+                 COMMON_OPTIONS
 }

 #
